column1: JOB/TASK, PRICE: FLOORING AND HOME INTAKE, FLOORS? OTHER CLEANING?

NOTES: WHAT AFTAB WANTS (E2W: FLOOR SWEPT, MACHINE CLEANED AND EDGES MOPED, FIRST 3 OFFICES SWEEP, MOP, VACCUM, LAST OFFICE VACUUM, KITCHEN VACUUM, BATHROOMS CLEANED SHOPPERS STYLE) ASK ROHAN FOR ANY QUESTIONS. QUOTE FOR ALL OF THIS TOGETHER IS $160 BEFORE TAX.
